$this->addElement('text', "content", array (
					'label'=>'Contenuto  ',
					'belongsTo' => $lng,
					'required'=> false,
					'description' => 'Inserire il contenuto',
					'prefixPath' => array('decorator' => array('FormDeco' => realpath(APPLICATION_PATH . '/../library/FormDeco')) ),
					'decorators' => array( 'SimpleTextarea', 'SimpleLabel' ),
					'class' => 'label-textarea-abstract mceNoEditor '. $class,
				));
